title: 6: Joe’s “Dear John” Letter to a Trump friend
itunes:title: Joe’s “Dear John” Letter to a Trump friend
description: Joe suggests to a friend that he stops sending politically-themed emails and takes the opportunity to ask why he voted for a politician who tried to get him arrested for murder; Mika talks about the time Deng Xiaoping showed up for dinner and describes the hilarity that followed.
itunes:author: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
dc:creator: The Joe Scarborough Podcast
